FAQ / Wave 5 / Characters /
View On Teletraan1.net

Topspin - Air & Space Assault

  1. What happens if Topspin defends and doesn't have Bold? [Source: WotC]
    In that case, his ability won't do anything. Perhaps there's a head that will give him Bold?
  2. If Topspin has Bold 1 and Tough 1 and defends, what happens? [Source: WotC]
    Topspin's own ability will add to any Tough total he already has. In that example, he'll have Tough 2 and flip 2 more battle cards.
  3. Topspin doesn't have any stars on his card, can I play him for free? [Source: Aequitas]
    No. That was a printing error. Topspin is a 9-star card.
